statements: SELECT * FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones;
SELECT alert_id, alert_date, budget_amount, expense_amount FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones WHERE expense_amount > budget_amount;
SELECT alert_type, COUNT(alert_id) AS alert_count FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones GROUP BY alert_type;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description, budget_amount, alert_date FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones WHERE budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY alert_date DESC
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, budget_amount FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones WHERE alert_type = 'Budget Exceeded' AND expense_amount > budget_amount
SELECT * FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones WHERE alert_type IN ('Critical', 'Urgent')
SELECT MAX(budget_amount) AS max_budget, MIN(budget_amount) AS min_budget FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones
SELECT COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM alerts_for_budget_milestones WHERE alert_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 100
SELECT alert_description, alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_type DESC
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT expense_name, expense_amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_type DESC;
SELECT alert_description, alert_threshold FROM alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Food' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_name, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM budget_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_description FROM budget_alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 1000;
SELECT * FROM alert_logs ORDER BY logged_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, budget_amount FROM user_budgets WHERE budget_amount < 500;
SELECT alert_id, log_id, logged_timestamp FROM alert_logs ORDER BY logged_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM budget_alerts;
SELECT alert_description, alert_threshold FROM budget_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'High';
SELECT user_id, budget_amount FROM user_budgets ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT budget_amount, alert_id FROM user_budgets WHERE alert_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, budget_amount, alert_description FROM user_budgets JOIN budget_alerts ON user_budgets.alert_id = budget_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT * FROM BudgetMilestoneAlerts;
SELECT alert_name, spending_limit FROM BudgetMilestoneAlerts WHERE alert_id = 2;
SELECT subscriber_name, email FROM AlertSubscribers ORDER BY subscriber_name DESC;
SELECT alert_name, spending_limit, planned_expense FROM BudgetMilestoneAlerts WHERE spending_limit > 1000;
SELECT subscriber_name, email, phone_number FROM AlertSubscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM BudgetMilestoneAlerts;
SELECT alert_name, spending_limit FROM BudgetMilestoneAlerts WHERE planned_expense > 1000;
SELECT subscriber_name, email FROM AlertSubscribers ORDER BY subscriber_name ASC;
SELECT alert_date, alert_message FROM AlertHistory WHERE alert_date < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT subscriber_name, enable_email_alert, enable_sms_alert FROM AlertSettings WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM budget_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM budget_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE user_id = 3 AND expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM alert_history WHERE alert_id = 10 AND viewed = TRUE ORDER BY alert_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT user_name, alert_date FROM users JOIN budget_alerts ON users.user_id = budget_alerts.alert_id;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type FROM budget_alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, expense_amount FROM users JOIN expenses ON users.user_id = expenses.user_id WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
